chartNotes: 38-year-old male presents for annual physical examination. No acute complaints. Patient reports feeling well overall. Review of systems negative except for occasional mild headaches. Physical examination reveals normal vital signs, clear lungs, regular heart rhythm, and no abnormal findings. Discussed preventive care including colonoscopy screening due to age. Labs ordered including complete metabolic panel and lipid profile. Patient counseled on diet and exercise. Follow-up in 1 year or as needed.
